pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, June 8, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Los Angeles, United States of America

Private meetings

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Barbados, Mia Mottley.

Belasco Room, Third Floor
Hotel Indigo Los Angeles Downtown

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of General Motors International, Shilpan Amin.

Belasco Room, Third Floor
Hotel Indigo Los Angeles Downtown

Closed to media

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with leaders attending the Summit of the Americas.

18 Social, 18th Floor
Hotel Indigo Los Angeles Downtown

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will participate in the Inaugural Ceremony of the Summit of the Americas hosted by the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden, and the First Lady of the United States of America, Dr. Jill Biden.

Microsoft Theatre
777 Chick Hearn Court

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage of the arrival and ceremony
